results.description: Use cashflow_invst and enterprise_value to capture firms generating cash relative to valuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multiple fields) and SUGGESTION3 (ts_backfill on enterprise_value because coverage=0.5). Did not apply SUGGESTION2 (no vector fields). Chose high userCount fields (cashflow_invst and enterprise_value) per SUGGESTION4. Confidence: 0.80

Classic value metric using ebit and enterprise_value. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3 (ts_backfill both fields). No vector fields so skipped SUGGESTION2. Both fields have high userCount (per SUGGESTION4). Confidence: 0.82
Momentum in operating_income: quarter-over-quarter change normalized by EV. Used ts_delta to capture change, ts_backfill for EV per SUGGESTION3, multiple fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.70
Detect accelerating sales: ts_delta(sales,4) scaled by assets to prefer efficient growers. Applied SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 (backfill sales and assets). No vector usage. Confidence: 0.68

CapEx relative to sales indicates investment cycle; used capex and sales. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill on both fields (SUGGESTION3). Both fields have high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence: 0.65

Track change in operating margin: ts_delta(operating_income - operating_expense,4) scaled by revenue. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill to low-coverage fields (SUGGESTION3). Did not use vector ops. Confidence: 0.66
Rising revenue per asset indicates efficiency improvements. Used ts_delta(revenue,4) / assets. Applied SUGGESTION1 & ts_backfill on both fields per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.64
Look for falling leverage: ts_delta(debt,4) negative is good relative to ebit. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill for both fields. Confidence: 0.62

Cross-sectionally select stocks with high return_assets zscore. Applied SUGGESTION1 (single strong field), ts_backfill since coverage=0.5, SUGGESTION4 used (return_assets high userCount). No vector. Confidence: 0.75
Momentum in current_ratio (ts_delta) favors improving liquidity; applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill on current_ratio and SUGGESTION1 implicitly single field. Confidence: 0.60

Use change in cash (ts_delta(cash,4)) vs. sales to proxy cash flow surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1, ts_backfill for both fields (SUGGESTION3), chose high userCount fields (SUGGESTION4). Confidence: 0.67
Large increase in receivable relative to sales may signal deteriorating quality. Implemented ts_delta(receivable,4)/sales with ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields. Confidence: 0.55
Rising accounts payable (proxy fnd6_cptnewqv1300_apq) relative to cogs can be a free short-term finance source. Used SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill both fields. Confidence: 0.52

Accruals ~ (net income - cashflow) normalized by assets: used fnd6_newa2v1300_revt (revenue proxy via retained earnings) avoided complex fields; applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields. Confidence: 0.50
High ebit relative to capex signals efficient returns on investment. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill both fields. Used high userCount fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence: 0.78
Efficiency measured by sales / employee count (sales / employee). Applied SUGGESTION1 with ts_backfill on both fields because coverage=0.5. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Tax Anomaly: Low Income Tax / Pretax Income
results.description: Companies paying unusually low taxes vs pretax income may have tax benefits. Used income_tax and pretax_income with ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.54
EBIT / (debt + equity) approximated by ebit / (debt + teq). Applied SUGGESTION1 combining debt and teq; ts_backfill both fields. Confidence: 0.76
Low EV/Sales historically attractive. Used enterprise_value and sales with ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.74
Cross-sectional zscore of ebit / revenue to find good profit margin names. Applied SUGGESTION1, ts_backfill on both fields (SUGGESTION3), and zscore. Confidence: 0.71

results.idea: CapEx Growth vs Revenue Growth Spread
results.description: If revenue grows faster than capex, it indicates improving capital efficiency. Used ts_delta on both and subtract. Applied SUGGESTION1 & ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.58

Compare ebit change vs cashflow_invst change: ts_delta(ebit,4) - ts_delta(cashflow_invst,4). Applied SUGGESTION1 & ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.57

Rising inventory relative to sales signals demand weakness. Used ts_delta(inventory,4)/sales with ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.53

Short-term extreme beta to mean: reverse(ts_zscore(beta,60)). Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill(beta) before ts_zscore. Confidence: 0.48
High cash minus debt normalized by assets: (cash - debt)/assets. Applied SUGGESTION1, ts_backfill all fields due to coverage and used high userCount fields. Confidence: 0.79
Revenue generated per unit of capex: revenue / capex. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.69

Valuation per operating income: enterprise_value / operating_income. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill both fields. Confidence: 0.72
ts_delta(ebit,4) zscored cross-sectionally to select improving profit firms. Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill and zscore. Confidence: 0.70

Use ebit and enterprise_value but winsorize extremes: winsorize(divide(enterprise_value,ebit)). Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill then winsorize. Confidence: 0.73

Rising operating_income while costs flat: ts_delta(operating_income,4) - ts_delta(operating_expense,4). Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.60

ts_delta(earnings per share measure) using fnd6_cptnewqv1300_oeps12 or eps proxies; applied ts_backfill and ts_delta. SUGGESTION4 picked oe p s field with higher counts. Confidence: 0.65

cash / current liabilities (cash / liabilities_curr) to find liquid firms. Applied SUGGESTION1 and ts_backfill both fields. Confidence: 0.72
